title: The Dr. Leaf Show
overview: Join Dr. Caroline Leaf, world-renown cognitive neuroscientist, on her talk show, The Dr. Leaf Show, featuring riveting and inspiring conversations with people who've gone through what you're going through. You'll discover how to tackle life's tough challenges, change the way you're thinking, and emerge stronger than ever by relying on God and His Word. Through neuroscience, you'll learn how to change your brain by changing your mind. The Dr. Leaf Show - learn to live life, the way that God intended.
